name.description: The name of the manifest resource
name.title: Name

description.description: The description of the manifest resource
description.title: Description

SAMChatbotMetadata.title: SAMChatbotMetadata

config.description: Plugin.spec.config[object]. The configuration for the Plugin.

plugins.description: Plugin.spec.searchTerms[list]. Optional. The Plugins to add to the Plugin.
plugins.title: Plugins

functions.description: Plugin.spec.functions[list]. Optional. The built-in Smarter Functions to add to the Plugin.
functions.title: Functions

apiKey.description: Plugin.spec.api_key[str]. Optional. The name of the API key that this chatbot uses for authentication.
apiKey.title: Apikey

subdomain.description: Plugin.spec.configuration.subdomain[str]. Optional. The subdomain to use for the chatbot.
subdomain.title: Subdomain

customDomain.description: Plugin.spec.configuration.custom_domain[str]. Optional. The custom domain to use for the chatbot.

deployed.description: Plugin.spec.configuration.deployed[bool]. Required. Whether the chatbot is deployed.
deployed.title: Deployed

provider.description: Plugin.spec.configuration.provider[str]. Optional. The provider to use for the chatbot. Default: openai.
provider.title: Provider

defaultModel.description: Plugin.spec.configuration.default_model[str]. Optional. The default model to use for the chatbot.
defaultModel.title: Defaultmodel

defaultSystemRole.description: Plugin.spec.configuration.default_system_role[str]. Optional. The default system prompt to use for the chatbot.
defaultSystemRole.title: Defaultsystemrole

defaultTemperature.description: Plugin.spec.configuration.default_temperature[float]. Optional. The default temperature to use for the chatbot.
defaultTemperature.title: Defaulttemperature

defaultMaxTokens.description: Plugin.spec.configuration.default_max_tokens[int]. Optional. The default max tokens to use for the chatbot.
defaultMaxTokens.title: Defaultmaxtokens

appName.description: Plugin.spec.configuration.app_name[str]. Optional. The name of the chatbot.
appName.title: Appname

appAssistant.description: Plugin.spec.configuration.app_assistant[str]. Optional. The assistant name of the chatbot.
appAssistant.title: Appassistant

appWelcomeMessage.description: Plugin.spec.configuration.app_welcome_message[str]. Optional. The welcome message of the chatbot.
appWelcomeMessage.title: Appwelcomemessage

appExamplePrompts.description: Plugin.spec.configuration.app_example_prompts[list]. Optional. The example prompts of the chatbot.
appExamplePrompts.title: Appexampleprompts

appPlaceholder.description: Plugin.spec.configuration.app_placeholder[str]. Optional. The placeholder of the chatbot.
appPlaceholder.title: Appplaceholder

appInfoUrl.description: Plugin.spec.configuration.app_info_url[str]. Optional. The info URL of the chatbot.
appInfoUrl.title: Appinfourl

appBackgroundImageUrl.description: Plugin.spec.configuration.app_background_image_url[str]. Optional. The background image URL of the chatbot.
appBackgroundImageUrl.title: Appbackgroundimageurl

appLogoUrl.description: Plugin.spec.configuration.app_logo_url[str]. Optional. The logo URL of the chatbot.
appLogoUrl.title: Applogourl

appFileAttachment.description: Plugin.spec.configuration.app_file_attachment[bool]. Optional. Whether the chatbot supports file attachment.
appFileAttachment.title: Appfileattachment
